cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to 0 will cause uplink processing failure as no threads are available for PUSCH decoding.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 with the first value greater than the second creates an invalid timing range, causing front-haul timing misalignment and synchronization errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 的第一個值設定為大於第二個值會創建無效的定時範圍，導致前傳定時錯位和同步錯誤。
